Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>はずっと一緒にいたから、 自分が<Eugene>といても平気だと言った。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao> said that it was okay for him to be around <Eugene> because they're always together.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、ポプラおばさんも、オレが小さな頃から ずっと隣に住んでいたのに、オレを襲った……
Entry.EnglishText: Yet even though Aunt Poplar has been my neighbor since I was a child, she went and attacked me...

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん……旅に出て、しばらく村から 離れてただろ？ だからじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... You were away from the village for quite some time during your journey. Could that be why?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、他の村の人たちにも 攻撃的でしたよ……？
Entry.EnglishText: How can that be, when she was acting aggressive towards the other villagers as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、そっか…… じゃあ、違うなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, I see. So, it can't be that...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか変な話ですよね……
